title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning for Critical Thinking Improvement in Accounting Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic accounting concepts and fundamental mathematical skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify logical errors and propose alternative solutions when analyzing accounting case studies.
Learners can improve decision-making processes by exchanging real-time feedback with team members using Nearpod-based collaboration tools.
Learners can apply a critical thinking framework with over 80% accuracy when interpreting accounting data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
